page.title: 11LEISURE & RECREATION, HEMEL
page.content: {Pavilion, Marlowes.}A wide range of activities for large groups, including dances and concerts (national as well as local orchestras, choirs etc). An Autumn Arts Festival takes place here, lasting 2 weeks. The Pavilion is also used for poetry reading, boxing, wrestling and Hemel Hempstead Ideal Home Exhibition in the spring.{Snooks {Bar}is open to the general public. {Old Town Hall, High Street.}Specialist theatre, which holds about 150 people. Refreshments are served in a small exhibition area used for minority interest and local history displays. {Cinema and Bingo Hall, Marlowes.}Only functions as a cinema 2 days a week. {Neighbourhood Areas.}Activities such as Scouts, Guides, squash, snooker & table-tennis take place.{Community {Centres}provide facilities for toddlers, wives & old peoples groups.
